#### 1Ten on Whyte, Edmonton

Overview

Book 1Ten On Whyte student apartments. They offer 2B, 3B, 4B, and studio apts near the University of Alberta with amenities like a gym and study room.

Heat  Hydro Gas Internet In-Suite Laundry

## About the Property

**1Ten On Whyte** is located at 11024 82 Ave NW, Edmonton, T6G, right in the student-friendly Whyte Avenue area. This student apartment in Edmonton puts you just a **4-minute drive away** from the University of Alberta and a **12-minute drive** from NorQuest College. Ten on Whyte offers you convenient housing near campus. The property offers **4-bedroom, 3-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 1-bedroom** options.

Edmonton, the capital city of Alberta in Canada, combines the convenience of urban living with a unique mix of outdoor spaces, arts, culture, and education. The city's **safety index** is **53.34,** and the **crime index is 46.66**. The monthly cost of living in Edmonton is affordable, with the average student spending around **$1,500 to $1,800** on **rent, groceries, transportation, and other essentials**. Edmonton also boasts a **healthy employment rate**, with opportunities for students to work part-time or gain experience in various industries in various sectors.

1Ten On Whyte is the perfect student residence in Edmonton, combining proximity to the universities and landmarks with excellent amenities and affordable living. Enjoy spacious, fully furnished units with utilities included, offering the ideal student living experience close to everything you need.

### Features

1Ten On Whyte offers everything you need. Located in the Whyte Avenue area, these 1Ten On Whyte apartments in Edmonton offer easy access to the rest of the city and some great locations for residents to explore. Choose from a range of spacious, thoughtfully designed room types to fit your lifestyle. Opt for the **4 Bed - 2 Bath, 3 Bed - 1 Bath, 2 Bed - 1 Bath,** or the cozy **1 Bed - 1 Bath**, each designed to provide comfort and functionality. Every room is fully furnished, featuring a **double bed, mattress**, **desk,** **and chair** for studying, and a **3-seat sofa** with a comfy **chair**, making it the ideal space to study or relax.

At 1Ten On Whyte Edmonton AB, the convenience doesn't stop at the rooms. Enjoy all-inclusive rent that covers **heat, hydro, gas, internet,** and **in-suite laundry**. The common amenities at 1Ten On Whyte are perfect for student living, including a **gym** for staying active, a quiet **study room**, and a comfortable **study lounge** for collaborative work. There's also a **boardroom** for group projects and a **courtyard** to relax in when you need a break. With **on-site laundry facilities**, you'll never have to leave the building for the essentials.

### Location and What's Hot?

1Ten On Whyte is located right in the heart of one of the city's most vibrant and student-friendly neighborhoods. With Northern Alberta Institute of Technology (NAIT) and The King's University nearby, this area is buzzing with student life, making it the perfect spot for anyone looking to immerse themselves in Edmonton's dynamic academic community.

When it comes to essentials, you can stop worrying. **Safeway Garneau** and **Brook's No Frills Edmonton** are just around the corner. The area is packed with hotspots that students love. Grab a coffee or study for your exams at nearby cafés like **Blush Lane Organic Café** for a cozy spot to relax, or **Dutchess Bake Shop** for delicious baked goods with your brew. For something more energizing, head to **Transcend Coffee**, a local favorite with great vibes for getting work done.

When hunger strikes, unwind at **RGE RD**, where modern rustic cuisine meets a cozy atmosphere, or check out **The Canadian Brewhouse** for casual dining and a lively environment. For a fun dinner at **The Greenhouse cafés**, offering fresh food and an inviting ambiance. For a peaceful getaway, the **Garneau Library** is just a short walk away for quiet study time. You can also relax in nearby green spaces like **Hawrelak Park**, offering the perfect spot to unwind.

The area is also home to many lively **bars and pubs**, like **The Sherlock Holmes Pub Campus**. 1Ten On Whyte is close to many of Edmonton's top tourist attractions, including the **Muttart Conservatory**, **Old Strathcona**, and the **Edmonton River Valley**, perfect for weekend outings or exploring after class.

### Commute

Getting around Edmonton is a breeze when you live at 1Ten On Whyte. You're just a short walk from two major bus stops: **111 Street & 82 Avenue** and **110 Street & 82 Avenue**. If you prefer light rail or tram, **Health Sciences Jubilee Station (light rail)** and **McKernan Belgravia Station (tram stop)** are also nearby. These stations provide easy connections to major areas of the city, including the University of Alberta, shopping districts, and more.

## Payment Policies (4)

### Booking Deposit
This property **requires** booking deposit.
The property requires the **last 1 month's rent** (if you have a Canadian or American citizen guarantor) or **last 4 month's rent** (if you do not have a guarantor) as a deposit. This must be paid within **48 hours** of signing the lease to secure your room with the property.

### Pay In Instalment
This property offers **1** flexible instalment plans.
Due monthly on the 1st.

### Mode Of Payment
Payment via easy transaction modes.
Automatic payments setup with either pre-authorized debit or a debit/ credit card.

### Guarantor Requirement
Guarantor requirements and policy.
The property requires you to have a Canadian or American citizen guarantor at the time of booking. If you do not have a guarantor, you need to pay an additional amount as a deposit.

## Cancellation Policies (1)

### Other cancellation policies
General cancellation policies **may** apply to this property.
Once the resident signs the lease they are responsible for all lease terms.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**When should I book?**
You should book well in advance to avoid disappointment. We do accept late bookings, however, this is based on availability which may be limited. Most accommodations have great offers which can be availed by early booking, we suggest booking your ideal accommodation as soon as possible.

**Can I make group bookings?**
Yes depending on the property type, we accept group bookings, please contact us to discuss availability.

**Does Amber charge any service fees?**
Amber will help you book the property as per your requirements. No- we do not charge you for our services, unless specified others.

**How do I cancel a booking?**
You can cancel your booking before the contract begins as per the cancellation policies mentioned on our page. Do read through the property's cancellation policies, get in touch with us to know more.

**Are Bills Included?**
Yes, Bills are Included.
